title: Costs and benefits of colonial empires 1850-1914

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which the formation of overseas colonial empires both benefited and harmed the interests of European states in the period 1850 to 1914.

frqParts.text:

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which the formation of overseas colonial empires both benefited and harmed the interests of European states in the period 1850 to 1914.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
